titles.title: To correct technical errors in the enrollment of the bill S. 610.
To correct technical errors in the enrollment of the bill S. 610.

action.text: Mr. Burgess asked unanimous consent to take from the Speaker's table and consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Makes technical corrections in the enrollment of (S. 610) to amend the provisions of title 5, United States Code, to provide for workforce flexibilities and certain Federal personnel provisions relating to the National Aeronautics and Space Administration.
